mean_cn: n. 下水道系统，污水处理系统，排水设备
mean_en: the system by which sewage is carried away from houses, factories, etc. and is cleaned and made safe by adding chemicals to it
sentence: The city's sewerage helped clear the rain water out of the streets.
sentence_trans: 城市的下水道系统将雨水从街道上清理出去。
word_etyma: sewer下水道 ＋ age表示物 → sewerage污水；排水设备
